subject: Football
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: For the Rutgers football team, a season of more preparation and focus has led to better play and even a spot in the Papajohns.com Bowl on Dec. 29.
snippet: For the Rutgers football team, a season of more preparation and focus has led to better play and even a spot in the Papajohns.com Bowl on Dec. 29.
